attributes.action: Look closely at forceable alternatives to Zanu PF and Robert Mugabe in Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The continuously and rapidly descending situation in Zimbabawe is worsening in relation to Mr Mugabe's growing confidence. This confidence is linked to the general consensus that he cannot and will not be held to account for his blatant infrinements on parliamentary and human rights in Zimbabwe. So much diplomatic spaek has resulted in nothing and now the MDC are oppressed further and in hiding. Britain is a nation of conscience and action. We must act now Sir.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
